thread.title: Amazon and Microsoft shares soar on profitable results
thread.title_full: Amazon and Microsoft shares soar on profitable results

author: Jay Greene
title: Amazon and Microsoft shares soar on profitable results
text:
Amazon and Microsoft shares soar on profitable results   23, 2015 at 3:35 pm Investors in the Seattle area’s two biggest tech companies raked in gains Friday, as shares of both shot up a day after both companies announced financial results. By Jay Greene Seattle Times business reporter 
Solid financial results on Thursday pushed stocks to heights not seen in 15 years for Microsoft or ever for Amazon. 
Amazon.com shares opened at $617.68 Friday morning, the day after reporting a surprising profit on the strength of its cloud-computing business, Amazon Web Services. It traded above $600 for most of the day before closing at $599.03, up $35.12, or 6.2 percent. 
Microsoft shares jumped from the opening bell as well, climbing over $50 for the first time since 2000. Shareholders bought up the stock on a higher-than-expected profit during its fiscal first quarter, buoyed by the sales of business-infrastructure tools. Microsoft shares ended the day at $52.87, up $4.84, or 10.1 percent. 
The stock gains added more than $16 billion to Amazon’s market capitalization, to $280.16 billion, and nearly $40 billion to Microsoft’s total share value, to $423.73 billion, according to YCharts.com. Most Read Stories
